name: Deeper Faster
description:
This is my first "official" Game Jam as a Game Designer/programmer. The game is a 2d plateformer and my submission for the Ludum Dare #48 made in 72hours. 

You are Bob, a blob in the middle of the Ocean, collecting garbage is for dust cleaners, You, are collecting pearls! But beware of the enemies (mostly Bio-hazard) that will try to steal your life out there.
